section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the disposition of several cases to announce.

In 54 original, United States against Florida and Texas, the exceptions to the report of the Special Master are overruled and a motion for leave to file a counter claim is denied in a per curiam opinion of the Court.
